verses.name: 1 Samuel 19:6
verses.text: And Saul hearkened unto the voice of Jonathan: and Saul sware, As the Lord liveth, he shall not be slain.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 19:7
verses.text: And Jonathan called David, and Jonathan shewed him all those things. And Jonathan brought David to Saul, and he was in his presence, as in times past.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 19:8
verses.text: And there was war again: and David went out, and fought with the Philistines, and slew them with a great slaughter; and they fled from him.
